name: Biologistics World Asia 2017
content: Biologistics World Asia will be the MOST Targeted event in Asia that focuses on cold- chain logistics for biomedical products. Bioplogistics World Asia 2017 will be attended by decision makers from regional and international biopharmaceuticals and biotechnology firms, top CMOs and CROs, government organizations and key global and Asian regulators. It’s your one stop solution to reach out to Asia’s logistics and supply chain industry!
